text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Well has to come from a long way back. The USA may have added jobs but what about the job losses, soaring Covid-19 cases, continuing high death rate, Trump not caring about anything but his own image , anybody in the White House  next will be 1,000,000% better than Trump.
